Text:
I saw reruns of this series on TNT in the 1990s.

The film quality was excellent. They didn't even have to be remastered.
I hope this is still active. My Father is looking for this. This is my first comment on this site, but I see at a 2:1 ratio. Certain items I seed forever. Especially rare items like this.
26 copies of the same episode of Then Came Bronson? Is this a joke or did something go horribly wrong here?
My mistake, I mistook the introduction for a cold show open. /wipe egg off face. Thanks man.
